entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -14.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except cloudy in onshore winds with flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy except cloudy in onshore winds with flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
